lines.text: Chaos can't harm us; it can only harm our enemies.
The only option for a pure idealist is to commit suicide.
To get rich is glorious said the leaders.
When we saw our classmates there holding our petition with raised arms, everyone cried.
The crime of counter-revolution is very unusual. What is being punished is not your actions but your intentions.
Patriotism and Collectivism are used to make the majority serve the few.
